data.meanings: Becoming distant, remote, far off, aloof or far awayRemoved, retired, withdrew to a distanceAlienated, estranged, wide separation, great distancePossessing judgment and prudence, penetrating, effective judgment, depth or far reaching judgmentGo or going a great length or far in hostility.
data.sentence: The word بَعْدَ comes from the root ب ع د and is associated with the meanings: Becoming distant, remote, far off, aloof or far awayRemoved, retired, withdrew to a distanceAlienated, estranged, wide separation, great distancePossessing judgment and prudence, penetrating, effective judgment, depth or far reaching judgmentGo or going a great length or far in hostility.

data.meanings: drew him along or dragged him roughly or violently, carried off/away, push/thrust, a man who hastens to do evil/mischief, a great eater who denies or refuses to give, a person who recoils from admonition or vehement in altercation, gross/coarse/low/ignoble/mean/rude in disposition.
data.sentence: The word عُتُلٍّ comes from the root ع ت ل and is associated with the meanings: drew him along or dragged him roughly or violently, carried off/away, push/thrust, a man who hastens to do evil/mischief, a great eater who denies or refuses to give, a person who recoils from admonition or vehement in altercation, gross/coarse/low/ignoble/mean/rude in disposition.
The word زَنِيمٍ comes from the root ز ن م and is associated with the meanings: base, ignoble, mean, evil character.
